product_name: Brooks Epiphany Sports Bra II - Women's - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Day after day, run after run, the Brooks Epiphany Sports Bra II offers comfortable support you can rely on for high-impact activities. Fabric draws moisture away from skin for evaporation, and seamless cups enhance comfort. Mesh fabric at back and sides, and breathable cup liners help keep you cool. The Brooks Epiphany Sports Bra II features a stylish, double-strap racerback to promote freedom of motion. Closeout.
short_description: Day after day, run after run, the Brooks Epiphany Sports Bra II offers comfortable support you can rely on for high-impact activities.
